mapper.insert: insert into OrderInfo (id, user, price, time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE OrderInfo SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select c.user, c.price, c.time, c.status, s.id as sid, s.orderInfo as sorderInfo, s.commodity as scommodity, s.receive as sreceive, s.commodityType as scommodityType, s.count as scount, s.time as stime from OrderInfo c, Orderdetails s WHERE c.id = s.orderInfo ORDER BY c.id DESC;

select c.user, c.price, c.time, c.status, s.id as sid, s.orderInfo as sorderInfo, s.commodity as scommodity, s.receive as sreceive, s.commodityType as scommodityType, s.count as scount, s.time as stime from OrderInfo c, Orderdetails s WHERE c.user = #{id} AND c.status = #{status} ORDER BY c.id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pageSize};

select c.user, c.price, c.time, c.status, s.id as sid, s.orderInfo as sorderInfo, s.commodity as scommodity, s.receive as sreceive, s.commodityType as scommodityType, s.count as scount, s.time as stime from OrderInfo c, Orderdetails s WHERE c.user=#{id} ORDER BY c.id LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pageSize};
